values:
Someone asked you what you wanted, what would you say?
a 2-day weekend

Are you wearing anything that doesn't belong to you?
it's all my own stuff

What's on your wrist right now?
nothing... surprisingly. I usually always have a hair tie

Have you ever stayed up all night on the phone?
Yes

Who do you tend to have the most fun with?
Kerri

Would you call yourself smart?
yes 

What are you listening to?
The music at my work. My boss isn't coming in till 1:30 and I finished most of the designs 

If someone liked you right now, what would be the best way to tell you?
Don't show it. I have a boy... although he's a pain in the ass

Are you looking forward to anything?
Working at a job that I want to work at for the rest of my life. Getting a house. 

Do you open up to people easily?
yes

Has anyone upset you in the past week?
yes. Some stupid French person at the restaurant and of course, Dennis.

Does anyone call you baby?
yes

Who is the last person you had a serious conversation with?
hmmm Either my boss or dennis or my mom

Do you like where you live?
not so much

What is the last thing you said aloud?
See you soon

Are you an emotional person?
haha yeah, but only with the boy

If you could change your eye color, what would it be?
I would look weird with a different eye color. But maybe a lighter brown.

What is your favorite board game?
Life and Cranium and Apples to Apples

What are you doing tomorrow?
working, going to the gym, and maybe making dennis take me out for drinks since it's a friday.

Are you currently frustrated with anyone or anything?
My boss, a little.

Is there someone you wish you could be spending your time with right now?
I'm pretty sure I would rather hang out with people than work ;)

Do you hate the last girl you had a conversation with?
not at all

Do you think anyone's thinking about you right now?
naw

What are you planning on doing after this?
Working on another kitchen design

Were you ever obsessed with Vitamin Water?
nope, never had it

Mood right now is?
tired!

What do you literally do everyday?
work

Do you own more then 16 shirts?
oh yes 16 x 100

Do you dress for style or comfort?
I dress for stylish comfort. I won't wear something stylish if it isnt super comfortable.

Today, would you rather go back a week or go forward a week?
forward I guess...

Who is the last person you cried over?
My dad. He's sick.

Who do you tell literally everything to?
Kerri and Dennis. 

Can you trust the number 1 person on your top?
yes

Do you have twitter or facebook?
I have a facebook but rarely use it

Do you believe in love at first sight?
no. I don't even remember seeing Dennis the first time. Although I got an instant crush on dana when I met him.

Do you think everything happens for a reason?
Yes, or else the world would be meaningless

Where did you last sleep besides your house?
House-sitting at my boss'

Do you think you will be successful?
I am successful!!!! haha. Actually, I'm scared that I won't end up being successful in something that makes me happy.

Do you think everything revolves around money?
Pretty much. Even if you don't want it to, 95% of things do. It sucks. But it's life. 

Do you talk a lot?
Yesssss I do

Is music 'your life'?
not at all

Do you think the last person you held hands with will hold your hand again?
uh yeah

Do you like school?
I do, that's why I keep on going back

When is the next time you will kiss someone?
around 5:15 pm

Last time you talked to your mom in person?
Yesterday

Have you ever fallen asleep in someone's arms?
Yeah

What's on your bedroom floor right now?
it's clean, so just a rug, chest, nightstand, bed, dresser, entertainment center.

When is your birthday?
November

Is anyone on your bad side right now?
nope

Do you hide your feelings or show them?
I can't hide anything

What should you be doing right now?
working on designs, I guess

What are you listening to?
another song on the cd

Are you getting engaged anytime soon?
nope

Do you feel awkward when strangers say hi to you?
no, it's nice.

Are you thinking about anyone?
now that you asked me

I don't think any of my friends use livejournal anymore.
I think I will always use it. 
It's my actual journal.

Yesterday was my grandma's 81st birthday. My parents, Dennis and I went down there and brought her KFC (what she wanted, weird I know) and hung out. She sang some of her favorite songs that she sang to her kids when they were young and it was cute. We had fresh peach pie and gave her presents. It was nice and relaxing. Then Dennis and I had to drive to my boss' house because they went out of town for a concert and we were house-sitting. They are FINALLY making me a key since I house sit for them so much.

This last weekend was really nice.
Saturday was the fight and I finally got to see some girls my age.
Working at the Cabinet Corner has limited the amount and kind of people I interact with.
And waitressing in Cambria is usually for middle-age and older people.
Sunday Dennis and I went to the swap meets and I found super nice jewelry that I love ad a earring stand holder that I had to really barter for because they had it for their display earrings but I've been looking for one forever! It's really neat. Old wood. Handmade and antique. 

Our place looks really cute.
Although I want to move because we are still having problems with everything.
I can live there for another 6 months though so we'll see.

Forth of July was lots of fun!
I would have won the hoola hoop contest but I wanted my man to get a prize... awwwww
Anyways
Drinking with the boss is quite fun.


Dennis took me to the melodrama, kaycking, miniature golf, and a seafood place.
At the seafood place we ordered a bucket of crab and they gave bibs and it was lots of fun.

Dennis and I sat next to a couple during dinner. They were super nice and gave us wine and stuff. I later asked her husband what they did for a living and he said that his wife is kind enough to let him live off her singing money. Yeah the lady next to me was Carlene Carter- The daughter of Joan Carter who was married to Johnny cash. She got mad at her husband and quickly changed the subject. Sure enough when I looked her up on the computer... it was her!
That was fun :)
She took a picture of dennis and I (before I knew who she was) and it turned out horrible. But I'll save it anyways :)

Work is good
I have my own clients and I designed their 3 bathrooms for them and yesterday they paid their deposit
:)
I'll be getting commission... hurray

well
I'm a college gradate!!!!
With my degree I am now considered a professional interior designer
:)

oh yeah
I got hired as full time as a kitchen designer
:)

although I'm going to be working full time for a while...
I decided that I only want to work here part time.
The restaraunt/waitressing job asked me back...

Even though I get paid good as a designer, the tips are too hard to give up, expecially since I'm saving up money. 
Also...
I'm happier with more variety in my life.

I hope this isn't a stupid decision

I'm so nervous

I'm graduating
I only have a part time job
Dennis and I have not yet found a house
My mother knows we are moving in yet my father does not
I don't know if they'll except my master's classes at Fresno State
I don't know if I can get into Cal Poly before the quarter starts
I don't know if I have enough money to even go to school
I don't know if my financial aide will hold up

Is that it?


I'm sick to my stomach

Finals Week!

One down
three to go!

So 
I'm freaking out but just a little bit

I'm sad I'm moving away from my best friend and roommate
We really got along perfectly

I'm sad that I'm leaving Fresno
it grew on me

but I am happy that I will be with my boy everyday

*****

We got approved for another place
I'm pretty sure we'll be taking this one

So this is the only place I can rant because apparently I can't talk to my boyfriend when something is really bothering me because I'm just "complaining"

I'm not complaining
I'm not putting him down
I'm not doing anything bad
I had something on my mind that was making me sad (nothing to do with him) and he said I was creating problems for myself

yeah... thanks buddy
That's EXACTLY what I was wanting to hear

where's the normal "it's okay babe, I'm here"
or at LEAST "Don't worry"
ALSO
this was a really big thing... not just a... "oh no I don't like my haircut" or "i have so much homework"
it was big, thanks BUDDY!

Somehow I was the one to apologize for everything
it's so messed up
I couldn't even open my mouth or else it would have been really bad

at least writing this makes me feel better :)

THANKS LJ
BOO boyfriend

:)

p.s.
I'm graduating next month!

YAY!
So Dennis and I found these super cute condos!
I love them
We turned in our application today.

Dennis said I can't get too excited because he doesnt want me to get my hopes up... 
but I can't help it. I'm excited

on a bad note:
I get no government help for graduate studies
therefore I am going to have to work full time
while getting my master's full time
I know it's going to be really hard, emotionally and physically
but it's okay
I'm still young

so I'm super nervous
Dennis and I are turning in applications today
but the place we want has two other pending applicants.
eek

I hope they like us

SPRING BREAK!
but not really
because I have 2 huge projects to do
yeah... thanks teachers

Dennis and I are house sitting my boss' house from Tuesday-Monday
so pretty much my whole break!
I absolutely love their beautiful home

Dennis and I are moving in together
I'm pretty scared
but much more excited

I'm moving back to Paso Robles after I graduate
because he is my man an will always be
so I'm giving up my dream of being a big shot designer in a big city
but my dreams have changed, so I'm okay with that... I'm MORE than okay with that :)

"You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams."

cheeeeesy, I know :)

That's my project
I just finished last night
I haven't been this sleep deprived in... um... ever
Poor Dennis spent all weekend not sleeping and helping me construct everything.
He's pretty much amazing.

Anyways
it's up in an art gallery and out show runs this week and next week.
Professional night is Thursday
and friends and family night is Friday
I'm so excited

most money I have ever spent on a project- gonna be more than $500
Pisses me off!

So
I know that I have been talking about my boyfriend life in this journal a lot, but it happens. 

I wanted to note the fact that he has changed dramatically
He has always been a superb boyfriend... we just clashed in some areas.
But now... he somehow... changed, and  we don't clash at all?
It wasn't like he needed to change, it was just that our personality differences that got in the way sometimes.
Is changed possible?
It's so weird...
I have never felt this way before and I am so... Excited!

He told me that he is going to make this work no matter what, because I am all he ever wants and I am all he looks forward too.

Yeah... I melted.

SOOOOOOOOO
My senior project show in the gallery is in March.
It will cost me hundreds of dollars and IS costing me most of my social life.
Although, I'm super excited about my design ideas/concept.
This is the big ending BANG for my college year before I graduate.

I'm kind of freaked out about graduating and finding a job.
Kerri and I made a road trip down to SLO today because Cal Poly was having an Architecture Design Fair.
We dressed all spiffy and printed out our resumes.
We talked to lots of firms, and a lot had an interior design unit within their firm.
A few told me that they liked me and were interested. They took my resume and gave me their business cards and told me to call them. 
Kerri and I were the only designers there since Cal Poly does not offer an interior design degree.
Yes, we were sneaking into the Cal Poly fair, but we told the head people and they were okay with it :)

I'm stressed
my whole week has been school and homework.
I've been working on homework till 5am everyday
I have no life

I want to go to Paso and see my man
"I am unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him" Happy Valentine's Day

SOOOOOOO
Life is good
Dennis and I are doing the best we have been doing in a long time
weird how that works

Valentine's Day is this Saturday
I'm excited

School is good
I'm exited

:)

So I finished up my first week of school and now am starting the second week.
Last semester till I graduate.
Weird.
Finding a full time job by summer that has to do with my degree would be awesome
but in this economy, who knows

I still have another year or two till I get my Master's
we'll see how it goes
At least I don't have to stay in Fresno because I can work on my thesis anywhere.
I'm pretty sure I finished all the master classes by the end of this semester
I'm glad I started this early while I'm still getting my lower degree.
It definitely saved me a year of school.

I can always go back to my intern place since they offered me a job.
I would like to move to a big city though.... Kerri and I... that would be perfect

oh, and maybe have a boyfriend
that'd be good too.

I'm not okay
I just want to be stress free about relationships
and it's not working out

I'm officially on Christmas Break!!!

Could this really be the best Christmas ever?
Could everything work out SO perfectly?
I hope I'm not getting my hopes up

I'm soooooooooo happy

I've been slacking on my poor journal

Well
it's finals week this week
I'm almost done
I finished all my projects except for my 20 page paper but written about half so I'm not too shabby

There is a party on Thursday because Kevin is leaving to go back to San Diego
boooooo
He was also lots of fun

I'm really excited for Christmas
Last week we went to Vine street!
so much fun! scrooge was hilarious
The week before we picked out a tree for my apartment hen went to Christmas tree lane:)

Dennis' sister had her baby on Saturday morning
Cale Thomas McClane
We rushed up north (7 hours) after we heard that her water broke
Longest I ever went without sleep
she had some complications but the baby is fine and he is BEAUTIFUL
I'm like an aunt! but not really...
like a girlfriend-aunt, or something :)
Anyways, it was exciting

I miss my boy.

It's 2 o'clock in the morning and I just finished watching a scary movie... ALL BY MYSELF
I've never done that before
and I'm regretting it because, did I mention...
I'M AFRAID OF THE DARK
AND I GET FREAKED OUT EASY


ahhh
bad idea haha

So I was complaining about getting old 
Dennis said he was going to trade me in for a younger model
I told him if I would look any younger than he'd be pretty darn pervy!
He's coming to Fresno for my birthday today
I miss him.

We're going to the last Fresno State football game on Saturday
yup
40 thousand people all gather FOR my birthday;)

School is okay
I hate one of my teachers
he hits on me
gross

Can't wait till Christmas!

I'm going to be so old!
Saturday I'll be 22:)

I've been having lots of fun
I can't wait till I do my picture post
haha
If im not to lazy!

Kerri and I had our first fight last night
I went in my room and cried to Dennis on the phone
it's harder fighting with a best friend than a boyfriend
I was really bothered:(

I hope this weekend turns out good because we had a lot of stuff planned 

On a happy note:
I re-arranged my closet
it's AMAZING!
I have a huge walk-in closet and now its packed full of clothes
I took all my stuff I had at Dennis' house and it doubled my wardrobe in Fresno :)

ok ok
so I only write when we have hard times
This weekend was not good
it was one of our toughest weekends
but you know what?
he absolutely loves me
no matter what
no matter how moody, sensitive, dramatic, stressed, upset, and CRAZY I may act.
How does he do it?
That's love.
<3

Most relationships tend to fail not because
the absence of love. Love is always present.
It's just that one was being loved too much 
and the other was being loved too little.

I'm really sad right now
I looked back in my journal and now I'm missing people

I'm freaking out because I have to decide where I am going to move to for jobs.
LA, San Francisco.... Paso Robles? Why paso? well.... my boyfriend.
But I need to move to a big city for my dream job.

Can someone be sure that the person they are with is right for them?
Or are they just right for them at the time.
Could you convince yourself that the person is right for you?
People can be in love multiple times in their life... but when they tell the person they love... that they will "love them forever" is that true?
I used to think so
I don't like when Dennis says he will love me forever
is that weird?
Do I not trust love?
Do I not trust the person?
I don't think it's intended to mean "forever" because what happens if we break up.... will he still love me in 20 years? No. 10 years? No. 1 year? maybe...
What about the people who have loved me before... do they still love me? Nope
Is love that fickle? 
It's made me think of love totally differently
I used to be so sure about things 
and now... I just don't know
Is Dennis the man for me?
I have to start planning my future... out of school
do I consider him?
I think I should
but should I?
What happens if it doesn't work out and I just screwed myself on potential situations that could have had amazing outcomes.
What if I don't plan him in my life?
Then he could have been the man I spent the rest of my life with.
What if I give up my dreams for him?
Are my dreams more important than him?
If it was someone else... would I be more sure?
Why am I thinking like this? 
I'm scared.
This is going to be a crazy weekend! Friday- Halloween part in Monterey Bay Saturday- Kerri's Birthday party Sunday- LAS VEGAS just in case if the font is too small... LAS VEGAS excited.
Anyone know any good corn mazes in Fresno?

Dennis Birthday was yesterday I have him a present for his car it was freakin expensive but it was his Christmas present too His brother and him both have the same birthday they have a tradition where they BBQ on their birthday weekends each year BBQ oysters yup every year They also had tri-tip and sausage I made everything else Salad, salsa, guacamole, hummus and bread/crackers, stuffed mushrooms and not to mention... DRINKS yes, I was the bartender :) it was a LOT of fun he has never been so happy he said it was his best birthday that made me happy I forgot to take pictures of the BBQ so this is all I have I told him to LOVE the present On his real birthday I took him out for breakfast then we rented 5 movies watched the movies and took a nap went out to dinner then we went for a bike ride at 11 at night then we watched another movie haha that's what he wanted to do! I was hungover so I didn't complain :)

MY BROTHER GOT MARRIED
it was pretty much the most beautiful thing in the world
I cried the whole time
and I have about a MILLION pictures :)!

School started
it's good

So much to update about!
Not really, but I've been having a fun end of summer!
The fair was fun with my boy
and I'm done with my intern job and they asked if I could work full time and they also gave me a very nice bonus the last day at work

Lots of drama with the waitressing job
Girls are lame
although I still like doing it
but it's getting stressful

Next weekend Dennis and I are moving my stuff back to Fresno
We are also house sitting my boss's super beautiful secluded house
they are leaving their bar open for us and they have a nice backyard with a hot tub
Party anyone? j/k

2 weeks till my brother is getting married
SCARY!
I'm so excited though!

Yesterday morning we went to the swap meet
Then Tom and Pricilla came over and Tom was trashed haha
Last night Dennis and I made a fabulous dinner
we should be professional chef's!
Cooking makes us closer

I'm sad to leave
but I'll be back every weekend!

THE NEXT WEEK IS MY SUMMER!!!!! I'm going to the midstate fair for the Stone Temple Pilots and Fergie Concert. I'm going with Dennis to the first one, then I'm going to the Fergie concert with my bestest girlfriends from school! I'm so excited I have this whole weekend off FIRST WEEKEND ALL SUMMER Dennis is surprising me with something on Sunday He's been trying to be a sweet boyfriend WE BBQ oysters on Tuesday It was intense I'm excited:) yup On Sunday We had VIP tickets to the Luguna Seca Races in Monterey Bay The tickets included free food and alcohol and Awesome seats they are only held once a year in the United States It was crazy (street bike races) Michael Jordan and Brad Pitt were there but I didn't see them :( I'm finally experiencing summer and it's making me happy. I BOUGHT A BIKE it's a red cruiser it kind of looks like pee wee herman's bike but cuter and not child molester-like

I'm pretty sure we look adorable! This picture was taken after a guy asked to take our picture on his camera because he thought it was oh so cute;) haha creeeeeeeeepy We played frisbee at the beach but he spent most of his time chasing my horrible tossed throws although after the first few, I got super good, yay farmer tans are NOT hot my butt looks cute I look like SUCH a nerd. He thought I was cute and that's why I'm dating him;) We went to a lot of beaches and I was searching for pretty rocks He got way more burnt than me. We went to lots of nice dinners but like a boy, he forgot to pack nice shirts :) We went to Morro Bay and went kayaking then we bought groceries and checked into our hotel at san simeon SO NICE We went to tons of beaches and played all weekend we ate at fancy places and now I'm SO SPOILED because I want that food alllllllll the time, haha We mostly hung out, ate, and drank it was relaxing and fun I like dressing up *sorry if I sound mushy, but we're finally getting along and I'm happy:)

I havent updated in forever!!!! I bought a CAR! It's beautiful and I love him. His name is either Lucy or Jasper not quite sure, but I'm sure he's a boy :) He's a 99' toyota celica white fully loaded so much fun to drive! way better than the newer celicas (although I almost bought one, but I'm glad I waited to find the older style I like) Last Sunday was Dennis' and our ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY I love that boy I have pictures, it was so much fun Work is great they want to give me a job after I graduate my other job, waitressing, is fun... I get lots of money I still work 7 days a week but I like it I feel more accopmlished and love the relaxing time with my boy Life is great 4th of July is tomorrow it should be fun I'm excited to post all my cute pictures!

I work every single day
I don't know what I'm doing
56 hours a week now
CRAZY

I want days off
I was getting this saturday off but they called and asked if I could work and I said yes
:(
I like waitressing :)!
I got proposed to twice yesterday, haha
and I got HUGE tips
like 30% from most of the people 
So I made bank in tips yesterday even though it was pretty slow
It's fun chatting it up with the customers.

I'm going to ask for lots of days off i July, from both jobs :)
by lots, i mean like 2 days from each job
haha
I need days off :(
I don't go in till 5 today so it was the first day of sleeping in
I loved it!
Dennis called me during his lunch break and he said I should try cutting my hours at my design job, but they called me this morning and asked to double my hours. I haven't called them back.

I think I have just about the cutest boyfriend Today was my first day waitressing. He woke up this morning with me at 6 o'clock and waited for me, then made me food and walked me to my car He placed a note in my car and it was super cute :) I love how boys can't draw hearts. Saturday morning he woke up early and bought me breakfast before I went to work at my intern job. :) The goose thought it was a duck! I'm going to like waitressing there it was a lot of fun except I didn't sit down, not even for a second, for 6 and a half hours my feet aren't used to that, haha Oh, but I will be working weekends now so that sucks :( I want a car I can't find one I'm being too picky

HAPPY MEMORIAL DAY

So the first wee of summer:

My job at the kitchen design company is going good, I like it a lot :)
I had to get another job since they didn't give me much hours
I am now a waitress in Cambria
COME VISIT ME :)
I'm excited to have 2 jobs
oh, and I still get the weekends off, yay

Saturday we picked out a cat for my grandma and brought it to her on Sunday
I didn't tell her I was going to do that and she didn't want the cat
but of course, I annoyed her for hours and she gave in
She'll thank me in a few weeks :) after she gets over being upset

Last Saturday we went to the wine festival
it was a lot of fun
I drank A LOT

Today we went to the lake
I liked it
it was the first time I went out at lake Naciamento
It was like a total lake party with people in there boats
we kept on getting latched on to other boats to socialize
there were some pretty crazy drunk blondes that get showing their boobs, haha
I drank wine coolers and got super tired, so we went home
and here I am :)

I'M DONE WITH SCHOOL!!! yup finished the last one at 5:30 I'm so stoked I'm also done packing!!! tonight, my friends and I are going out! partttttttttyyyyy Then all my roommates are cleaning the house tomorrow hung over yup that's going to suck I'm excited for Saturday:) Dennis and I are doing good now summer should be amazing

omg
I just realized I'm signed up for 21 units
haha it's going to be a fun semester
oh yeah, and nine of those units are master classes
crazy melissa

4 FINALS DOWN ONE TO GO omg I'm so excited! And Dennis and I are going to have tons of fun Saturday Then Sunday he is driving me back here to Fresno to finish packing everything oh and I got my internship! I will be working at a high end kitchen design firm in Paso Robles They will be teaching me the computer program needed for kitchen design that the architects and cabinet makers use so I can help design kitchens how fun huh? Only working 15 hours a week so I can get another job But I won't have to commute to work this summer so excited:)

I've been a mess
poor dennis...
I've been moody and crying and everything you can think of
He tried so hard yesterday to make me happy. 
he just doesn't know me or something, because he was SUCKING at it
you're not suppose to say "Yeah, that's horrible, I'd feel like crap too"
You ARE suppose to say "It's no big deal, everything will be fine"
Seriously boy, it's not that hard
He took me out for drinks, which was a good move on his part.

SO many things in my life came at ONCE
it's crazy
I don't want to talk about it because I can't stop dwelling on everything

On a happier note
FINALS NEXT WEEK
been staying up every night working on projects
I'm pretty scared about finishing everything but summer is after that!

I've been rejected by 10 interior design places, either in person or on the phone.
how lame
the economy is going down hill and no one is hiring 
also, 6 places I tried to go to in san luis has shut down permanently
I ran out of places to call and look, then out of the blue I looked in the phone book one more time and saw one I forgot to call
I have an interview with them at 12:30 :)

I've been to 4 interviews already and they all wanted me from September-December
uhhh I have school.
I wish!!!

Dennis taught me how to drive a stick
I'm okay at it, although we only did it a short while
He said I'm super good, but I don't think so
It takes me a few seconds to start going
Then I drove around town and he got me nervous and I stalled
It was embarrassing

He was a good teacher
very nice boy

We went out Saturday
It was totally FUN till the end, although I don't remember.
I'm super sore though
oh yeah, I broke a glass all over the bathroom floor :( ooooooooops

I'm waiting for him to do something extremely nice for me REALLY soon
he better

uh yeah
still haven't found a car
and still haven't started my projects
I'm doing badddddddddd

Last night me and Kerri made class much more exciting;)
and passed our drinks around too
haha
the teacher totally caught on but she didn't care because we gave her some of our french fries :)

so instead of doing homework last night
Kerri and I had fun
then made our other roommate drive us to taco bell at 2 in the morning
she drove my car
did I mention she has never driven?
ohhhhhh it was exciting
she did good though :)

NO MORE SLACKING OFF

I'M OFFICIALLY....
well not officially, YET, because I won't know till tonight
but I'll let you know tomorrow

CRAZINESS
